alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:32PM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WHEELER COUNTY... At 631 PM CDT, two severe thunderstorms, the first 8 miles northeast of Twitty and the second 4 miles north of Lela, were moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 622 PM CDT, trained spotter reported quarter size hail 4 miles south of Wheeler. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Twitty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
